content: sizes one-size materials garnstudio safran 100% egyptian cotton 50 g/160 m /174 yards 50 gr nr 22 brown alternate yarns * garnstudio silke 100% silk 50 g /200 m /218 yards * garnstudio silke-tweed 52% silk 48% lambswool 50 g /200 m /218 yards * garnstudio cotton-viscose 54% egyptian cotton 46% viscose 50 g /110 m /120 yards drops 3 5 mm us crochet hook or size needed to obtain correct gauge crochet gauge 20 sts in width = approx 10 cm
